original_text: When we meet together as God's people, he wants there to be peace among us. He does not want to bring trouble. This is what happens in all the churches where God's people meet together. When we meet together as God's people, he wants there to be peace among us. He does not want to bring trouble.
korean_text: 하나님은 무질서의 하나님이 아니시요 오직 화평의 하나님이시니라

sentences.original_text: When we meet together as God's people,
he wants there to be peace among us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리 중에 평화가 있기를 원하십니다.

sentences.original_text: He does not want to bring trouble.
When we meet together as God's people,
he wants there to be peace among us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리 중에 평화가 있기를 원하십니다.

sentences.original_text: He does not want to bring trouble.
